title: Asia Album: Museum with Peranakan history, culture in Thailand
content:
A woman visits the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand, Sept. 12, 2020. (Xinhua/Zhang Keren)
BANGKOK, Sept. 13 (Xinhua) -- Come and visit! Peranakan Phuket Museum in Thailand's Phuket displays the Peranakan history and culture through various exhibits and technologies.
Photo taken on Sept. 12, 2020 shows the crafts displayed at the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand. 
A man poses for photos at the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand, Sept. 12, 2020. (Xinhua/Zhang Keren)
A woman visits the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand, Sept. 12, 2020. 
A man takes a virtual bicycle tour of Phuket Old Town at the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand, Sept. 12, 2020. (Xinhua/Zhang Keren)
Photo taken on Sept. 12, 2020 shows the crafts displayed at the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand. 
A woman visits the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand, Sept. 12, 2020. (Xinhua/Zhang Keren)
A woman visits the Peranakan Phuket Museum in Phuket, Thailand, Sept. 12, 2020. (Xinhua/Zhang Keren)
